title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 5 categories on the x axis representing Country, and Proportion of soccer players in each Country on the y axis.
Germany is higher than any other categories with value 19.8, followed by Chile, and Paraguay. Down to category The Netherlands with the lowest value of 10.4.
